resources.string:
Hi, my name is Syrym. 

 Now I'm Studying in Astana IT University at Educational program Computer Science 

 I love doing a lot things. 
 For Example: reading books, watchings TV serials, movies, or playing Mobile Games(Android). 
 From books, I prefer to read science fiction or fantasy books rather than literary and other genres. 
 And my preferences for TV series are similar to my book preferences. 

 And if we talk about my preferences when choosing a game, then by and large I choose games that you can play with friends or those games in which you have to think.
